body.name: Razer Naga Trinity Gaming Mouse: 16,000 DPI Optical Sensor - Chroma RGB Lighting - Interchangeable Side Plate w/ 2, 7, 12 Button Configurations - Mechanical Switches
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 36 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 36 mins
features: High-Precision 16,000 DPI Optical Sensor: Offers on-the-fly sensitivity adjustment through dedicated DPI buttons (reprogrammable) for gaming
Full Modular Customizability: 3 interchangeable side plates with 2, 7 and 12-button configurations
Up to 19 Programmable Buttons: Allows for button remapping and assignment of complex macro functions through Razer Synapse
Customizable Chroma RGB Color Profiles: Supports 16.8 million color combinations w/ included preset profiles
Ridged, Rubberized Scroll Wheel for Maximum Accuracy: Small, tactile bumps increases grip and allows for more controlled scrolling in high-stakes gaming situations
body.description: Product Description Experience the power of total control in your hand, no matter what game you play. Designed to provide you that Edge you need in MOBA/mmO gameplay, the Razer Naga Trinity lets you configure your mouse for everything from Weapons to build customizations so you'll always be ahead of the competition. 1000 Hz Ultrapolling,Razer Synapse 3 (Beta) enabled, Ergonomic right-handed design with enhanced rubber side grips,Compatible with Xbox One for basic input, Gaming-grade tactile scroll wheel. Set Contains: Product, Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plenty of Options
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouse so much that I bought another one. The seven button side is my favorite as it allows positive thumb placement without the risk of accidentally hitting a button and the radial setup of the buttons makes for easy selection of the correct macro button. Swapping sides on the mouse is simple an easy and auto loads my preset macros making working in AutoCAD or swapping to play a game quick. Razor Synapse is also easy to work with allowing me to quickly create custom macros for specific projects. The mouse wheel gives good tactile feedback and doesn’t accidentally scroll with fast movement of the mouse. Tracking is precise on most surfaces, even when I’m lazily browsing kicked back in my chair using my leg as a mouse pad.Delivery was quick and the mouse arrived with the packaging and contents undamaged. I would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Naga Is The Best
reviews.reviewText: This was the original mmo mouse. And it is still excellent to this day.Contoured just right, buttons in correct position, responsive. It’s a really well built mouse with tons of buttons!I have owned a few different brands but keep coming back to the naga. If you are on a budget the Red Dragon version is really really good especially at the price point.Overall if you can spend the money on it, get it. If not go with the Red Dragon version. All other brands need some sort of modification to enjoy.Cheers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Side buttons will randomly stop working multiple times throughout using the mouse. Actual trash product never buying razor mice again I'll just go back to using corsair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Scroll wheel broke almost instantly
reviews.reviewText: I had this mouse less than a week and the scroll wheel broke. Very surprising and disappointing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars this mouse is pretty bad
reviews.reviewText: Within the first day the scroll wheel is messed up and barely works. It's heavy, the clicking is loud. overall its the worst mouse I've ever had and the most expensive. if I hadn't received it as a Christmas gift I would definitely be returning it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don't bother - mouse scroll dies within 24 hours!
reviews.reviewText: First bought this for my wife's birthday; Impossible to scroll down without pressing the scroll down. At first it was smooth, but 24h later, the scroll started feeling hard to use. In the meantime, I had already ordered a 2nd identical mouse. Same issue after just 2h! These are probably the worst mice I've ever had. Returning them asap. Don't waste your money!Googled the issue and I'm not the only one with the exact same issue.Razer, this is unacceptable!
great mouse the usage of keys is great .comfort for editors u will get 100 working macros shorts worth every penny

Llevo 20 años jugando a MMOs y con diferencia, este es el ratón que más he disfrutado de usar. Solia usar ratones de 6 botones en el lateral, el último el Logitech G604, pero últimamente he tenido muy mala suerte con productos Logitech, el 604 uno de los botones que frecuentemente suelo machacar más, simplemente se rompio, tanto en el ratón que compré como en el reemplazo que me enviaron (en este último hasta se cayó del todo!).Un amigo me recomendó el Naga, y probé. Hay que decir que hay un periodo de adaptación de aprox. 1 mes para acostumbrate bien a su uso, pero una vez hecho no hay marcha atrás. Es super facil y cómodo de configrar, la forma y angulo de los botones dejan identificar cada botón individual con facilidad, y el ratón es super ligero y preciso. Y lo mejor, por mucho que machaco los botones, funcionan igual de bien que el pimer dia - la calidad de fabricación es impecable, se nota que está hecho para durar.El unico punto negativo que le podría dar, es que quizás para personas que tengan las manos muy grandes y dedos muy gruesos y toscos, sea dificil de usar los botones puesto que son relativamente pequeños.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Dit is de meest makkelijke muis om mee te gamen. Een echte aanrader

reviews.reviewTitle: Right click won't hold after only 1 month of light use
reviews.reviewText: Sending it back and getting a refund now. If I don't apply enough force to the right click then it won't register as being depressed even though it audibly clicked. Makes dragging things with the right mouse button infuriating.Need to move your camera around in WoW/any mmorpg? Forget about it.Need to keep aiming down your sight in a FPS? Forget about it.Need to right click and drag an object in an image editing program? Forget about it.
